tool.name: ROI Thumbnail Plots
tool.command: roi_plot_thumbnails.py --in-file $input --out-file "$out_file" --out-dir "$out_file.files_path" #if $max_rois # --max-rois $max_rois #end if #if $num_rows # --num-rows $num_rows #end if #if $num_cols # --num-cols $num_cols #end if #if $plot_height # --plot-height $plot_height #end if #if $plot_width # --plot-width $plot_width #end if #if $link_target # --link-target $link_target #end if #if $link_type # --link-type $link_type #end if #if $igv_host # --igv-host $igv_host #end if #if $igv_port # --igv-port $igv_port #end if #if $ucsc_org # --ucsc-org $ucsc_org #end if #if $ucsc_db # --ucsc-db $ucsc_db #end if #if $ucsc_chr_prefix # --ucsc-chr-prefix "$ucsc_chr_prefix" #end if

param.name: input
param.label: ROI file to generate statistics for.

param.name: max_rois
param.label: Maximal total number of records to process. 0 for all.

param.name: max_value
param.label: Maximal value to plot. 0 for no limit.

param.name: plot_height
param.label: Height of one plot in px.

param.name: plot_width
param.label: Width of one plot in px.

param.name: ucsc_chr_prefix
param.label: Prefix to add to contig names.
